greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Replace all digits greater than 1 with 1 (in decimal representation).
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9999
program: (PARI) a(n)=subst(Pol(apply(k->min(k,1), digits(n))),'x,10) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 31 2013
a136400 n = a136400 n' * 10 + min 1 d where (n',d) = divMod n 10
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 30 2007
